messages.title: DON'T LET JEREMY HELP THERESA GET A HARD BREXIT
CAN YOU TRUST CHRIS LESLIE TO SPEAK FOR YOU?
messages.content: Did you know? Labour MP Chris Leslie was parachuted into Nottingham East in 2010 after he lost his seat in West Yorkshire. Nottingham East deserves someone who cares about our area (not just seen for the time it takes to trigger Article 50, even though he said he would vote to remain).

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We need to refocus on teaching British children our excellent values and ensuring everyone gets a fair deal.
10p on income tax to raise £6 billion for our NHS.
Give the British people a final say on the Brexit deal.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Jeremy Corbyn, Theresa May, Chris Leslie

issues.brexitEurope: Give the British people a final say on the Brexit deal.
issues.education: We need to refocus on teaching British children our excellent values and ensuring everyone gets a fair deal.
issues.health: 10p on income tax to raise £6 billion for our NHS.

leaflet.personalStatement: Barry has worked in the NHS and in schools. He knows Nottingham East has been let down by local politicians for too long. Local issues are his priorities, not a platform for his own career.
leaflet.additionalNotes: The content suggests that the primary focus of the campaign is against a 'Hard Brexit' and the incumbent MP's record.
